name: Don Shula
description: Don Shula, 3rd place winner of Best Hybrid Flower at the 2016 Colorado Cannabis Cup, crosses The White and Diagonal (True OG x East Coast Sour Diesel) to create a hybrid that sits upright in the body and mind. Exhibiting functional OG effects, this pungent strain is a comfortable middle ground for indica-dominant enthusiasts seeking an all-day strain.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Talkative, Euphoric, Relaxed, Happy, Depression, Fatigue, Stress, Headaches, Dry Mouth
